entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023
